channel.title: 虞双齐Golang开发与SRE运维
channel.description: 在 虞双齐Golang开发与SRE运维上关于的内容

item.title: go用slice模拟vector功能
item.author: devysq@gmail.com (虞双齐)
item.description: appendVector ``` - 编程语言与开发 a = append(a, b…) copy ==== ``` - 编程语言与开发 b = append([]T(nil), a...) ``` - 编程语言与开发 b = make([]T, len(a)) copy(b, a) cut删除一段范围i\~j =================== ``` - 编程语言与开发 copy(a[i:], a[j:]) for k, n := len(a) - j + i, len(a); k < n; k++ { a[k] = nil //or the zero value of T } a = a[:len(a) - j + i] delete删除指定i ``` - 编程语言与开发 copy(a[i:], a[i+1:] a[len(a] - 1] = nil //or zero value of T a = a[:len(a)-1]
